modName: Unlimited Conjuration - remove every conjuration limit
summary: With this mod you can summon 2.000.000.000 creatures together!
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can summon 2.000.000.000 creatures together!

Unlock the second level of \"Conjuration Novice\" perk to remove conjuration limits. (Level 0 or higher is required :D)
*If the mod doesn\'t work try to update the game (i use version 1.4)...*

Enjoy!

PS:
- If you want to have MORE than 2.000.000.000 creatures this mod isn\'t for you :(
- Sorry for bad English, i\' m Italian (the mod works anyway, don\'t worry)
author: Getaway1
